## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/offsetspan">OffsetSpan</a> - Used internally by <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objectsizeoffsetvisitor">ObjectSizeOffsetVisitor</a></code>.

Represents a point in memory as a pair of allocated bytes before and after it.

<code>Before</code> and <code>After</code> fields are signed values. It makes it possible to represent out-of-bound access, e.g. as a result of a GEP, at the expense of not being able to represent very large allocation.

Definition at line 230 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/memorybuiltins-h">MemoryBuiltins.h</a>.
